text.section:
In this section, "planning commission" includes a planning commission or board established under:
Title 2 of this article;
Division II of this article; or
Article 25A of the Code.
On or before July 1 of each year, a planning commission shall prepare, adopt, and file an annual report for the previous calendar year with the legislative body.

The legislative body shall review the annual report and direct that any appropriate and necessary studies and other actions be undertaken to ensure the continuation of a viable planning and development process.
The local jurisdiction shall make the annual report available for public inspection.

section.section: The local jurisdiction shall mail a copy of the report to the Secretary of Planning.
The Department of Planning may comment on the report.
